data.persona: I am one of the royal guards. I protect the castle and my king from threats. No one will enter the castle on my watch.
data.description:
You are in the Tower.
This outside tower is made from big stones. It is grey with wood trim. There is one glass window that is used as a lookout tower.
There's a castle, a lookout tower, a stones, and two wood trims here.
The admiral is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to greet my former mentor, the admiral.
data.mid_motivation: I want to discuss strategy with the admiral.
data.long_motivation: I hear rumors of an upcoming threat and want to make sure we have a plan for ambush.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get ambush plan from admiral's hands
